summary: This mod adds the ability for the player to exchange dragon souls for different rewards. Players can trade excess dragon souls for coins, perk points or attribute points.
descriptionHtml:
[color=greenyellow]Update to version 1.1[/color] - Added the option to purchase Dragon Souls from Daglin. Additional options in the customization menu. Slightly tweaked interior navmesh in _dsoulcave.

This mod adds the ability for the player to exchange dragon souls for different rewards. Players can trade excess dragon souls for coins, perk points or attribute points. The mod adds an NPC who will carry out the trades to the far west of Solitude. See attached screen-shots for further information.

The mod is customizable from within the game. The dragon soul coin, perk point and attribute point values can all be adjusted to one of four presets.

[youtube]YDhYcr2dfsU[/youtube]

[youtube]Gam76mTz4VM[/youtube]

This mod has no dependencies and is fully compatible with the vanilla game, requires no DLC.

This mod should be compatible with almost everything, if you would like me to test compatibility with anything in particular please advise.

To install this mod, download the .rar and use the nexus mod manager. Or you can drop the .esp and .bsa files into your Data directory if you don\'t use the mod manager.

Created by mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger.

=============
RELEASE NOTES
=============

========================
v1.1.0
========================

Date of release: 19/03/2013
Purpose: Content update
Notes: Added the option to purchase Dragon Souls from Daglin. Additional options in the customization menu. Slightly tweaked interior navmesh in _dsoulcave.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_dsoulcave

========================
v1.0.0
========================

Date of release: 17/03/2013
Purpose: Initial release
Notes: This is the first public release version, it adds the \"Daglin\'s Cave\" area for the player to use, and the “Daglin” NPC to trade with.
Released by: mackam08 aka IrksomeBadger

NEW CELLS
=========

_dsoulcave

CHANGED CELLS
=============

_dsoulcaveloc (Wilderness -42, 24)

========================
author: IrksomeBadger
